item.title: 赞比亚通胀率创 26 个月新高，货币路线卷土重来
item.description: 赞比亚的年通货膨胀率攀升至 26 个月来的新高，而且可能会继续上升，因为该国部分地区出现了创纪录的干旱，而且货币再次疲软，抬高了物价。【原文：Zambia’s annual inflation rate climbed to a 26-month high and may continue to increase as a record drought in parts of the country and renewed weakness in the currency lifts prices.】

item.title: 价格下跌钻井产量增加，中国石油利润上升
item.description: 由于中国最大的海上钻井公司在全球原油价格略微下跌的情况下继续增加产量，中国石油天然气股份有限公司第一季度利润创下历史新高。【原文：Cnooc Ltd. saw profits hit a record in the first quarter as China’s biggest offshore driller continued to increase output amid slightly lower global crude prices.】

item.title: 为躲避英国罚款，H2O 将向愤怒的客户提供数百万奖金
item.description: H2O 资产管理公司（H2O Asset Management）正试图通过向愤怒的客户提供补偿来避免英国的罚款，这些客户自 2020 年以来一直无法获得当时价值约 16 亿欧元（17 亿美元）的投资。【原文：H2O Asset Management is seeking to avoid a UK fine by offering payoffs to irate clients who have been prevented since 2020 from accessing investments that were then worth about €1.6 billion ($1.7 billion).】

item.title: 谁是全球人工智能人才争夺战的赢家？
item.description:
顶级研究人员的竞争内幕。【原文：

Inside the competition for top-tier researchers.

】

item.title: ETF.com 奖项指南
item.description:
以下是今年的大赢家。【原文：

Here are this year’s big winners.

】

item.title: 欧洲房地产交易下滑至 13 年来最低水平
item.description: 自借贷成本飙升以来，欧洲房地产市场的冰冻期在今年年初进一步加剧，交易量骤降至 2011 年以来的最低水平。【原文：The deep freeze that’s gripped Europe’s real estate markets since borrowing costs jumped worsened at the start of the year as deals plunged to their lowest levels since 2011.】

item.title: 国际米兰业主正与橡树和 Pimco 商谈贷款再融资事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，国际米兰足球俱乐部（FC Internazionale Milano SpA）的所有者一直在与橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management）和太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：The owner of FC Internazionale Milano SpA has been in discussions with Oaktree Capital Management and Pacific Investment Management Co. to refinance a loan coming due in May, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Indivior 确认将从伦敦转到纽约上市的计划
item.description: Indivior Plc 已确认计划在今年夏天将其主要上市地转到纽约，并将在下个月要求股东批准这一决定。【原文：Indivior Plc has confirmed plans to switch its primary listing to New York this summer, and will ask shareholders to approve the decision next month.】

item.title: 日本散户投资者在股市暴跌之际买入创纪录的股票
item.description: 上周，日本散户投资者购买了创纪录数量的国内股票，而股市则因中东紧张局势、美国利率走势以及芯片行业前景等各种担忧而下挫。【原文：Japan’s retail investors purchased a record amount of domestic stocks last week, as the equity market sank on concerns ranging from tensions in the Middle East and the path of US interest rates to the chip industry outlook.】

item.title: 本田 110 亿美元电动汽车计划包括加拿大政府援助
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，本田汽车公司将斥资 150 亿加元（约合 110 亿美元）在多伦多北部建造电动汽车，加拿大立法者承诺将提供大量财政援助。【原文：Honda Motor Co. will spend C$15 billion ($11 billion) to build electric vehicles north of Toronto, with lawmakers in Canada promising significant financial aid, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 电池巨头 CATL 的最新电池组可为汽车提供更多动力
item.description: 在推出快速充电、长效电动汽车电池不到一年之后，行业巨头当代安培科技有限公司（Contemporary Amperex Technology Co.Ltd. 又推出了升级版。【原文：Less than a year after unveiling a fast-charging, long-lasting electric vehicle battery, industry giant Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. is back with an upgrade.】

item.title: 泰国证券交易所主席辞职被视为财务总监职位的前奏
item.description: 泰国证券交易所主席披差-春哈瓦吉拉（Pichai Chunhavajira）已经辞职，此举被认为预示着他可能被任命为泰国财政部长。【原文：The Stock Exchange of Thailand Chairman Pichai Chunhavajira has resigned in a move seen foreshadowing his possible designation as the country’s finance minister.】

item.title: 中国资金大量涌入，香港股市再度火爆
item.description: 随着中国投资者的疯狂购买，香港股市突然又热了起来。【原文：Suddenly, Hong Kong stocks are hot again with Chinese investors on a buying spree.】

item.title: 必和必拓提出报价，英美资源集团估值 311 亿英镑
item.description: 必和必拓集团证实，它向英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）提出了一项全股提案，对这家规模较小的矿业公司的估值为 311 亿英镑（388 亿美元）。【原文：BHP Group confirmed it made an all-share proposal to Anglo American Plc valuing the smaller mining company at £31.1 billion ($38.8 billion).】

item.title: 威兹航空因发动机问题缩小全年利润目标
item.description: 威兹航空控股公司（Wizz Air Holdings Plc）收窄了全年净收入指导，原因是该廉价航空公司的一些空客 SE 喷气式飞机发动机出现问题，导致飞机停飞。【原文：Wizz Air Holdings Plc narrowed its net income guidance for the full year as the budget airline faces aircraft groundings because of engine issues on some of its Airbus SE jets.】

item.title: 中国停止出售与离岸 LGFV 债务相关的衍生品
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国已采取另一项措施，限制国内投资者接触地方政府融资工具发行的离岸债务。【原文：China has taken another step to limit domestic investors’ exposure to offshore debt issued by local government financing vehicles, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 财政部长称比索下跌不会刺激菲律宾加息
item.description: 菲律宾财政部长拉尔夫-雷克托（Ralph Recto）表示，菲律宾比索目前的暴跌不太可能促使中央银行在此时将其关键利率从17年来的高点上调。【原文：The Philippine peso’s current slump is unlikely to prompt the central bank to raise its key interest rate from a 17-year high at this time, according to Finance Secretary Ralph Recto.】

item.title: Masan 集团考虑在今年将消费品部门作为筹资选项进行首次公开募股
item.description: 越南 Masan 集团首席执行官丹尼-黎（Danny Le）在胡志明市股东大会上表示，除其他融资方案外，该集团正酝酿于今年对旗下 Masan Consumer Holdings 公司进行首次公开募股，以推动业务扩张。【原文：Vietnam’s Masan Group is mulling an initial public offering of its unit Masan Consumer Holdings this year among other funding options to fuel expansion, Chief Executive Danny Le said during the company’s Ho Chi Minh City shareholders’ meeting.】

item.title: 美国重新实施制裁后，中国购买委内瑞拉石油的价格有所下降
item.description: 在美国重新对委内瑞拉这个南美产油国实施制裁后，中国炼油商为委内瑞拉石油支付的价格略有下降。【原文：Chinese refiners are paying a little less for Venezuelan oil after the US reimposed sanctions on the South American producer.】

item.title: LSEG 称与微软的合作将在数月内发布产品
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团（London Stock Exchange Group Plc）计划在未来几个月内发布其与微软公司（Microsoft Corp.【原文：London Stock Exchange Group Plc plans to release a number of products generated by its data partnership with Microsoft Corp. in the coming months, it said as its first-quarter earnings met expectations.】

item.title: 大和银行利润增长一倍多，日本交易蓬勃发展
item.description: 大和证券集团公司（Daiwa Securities Group Inc.【原文：Daiwa Securities Group Inc.’s quarterly profit more than doubled, driven by a surge in trading for Japan’s second-largest brokerage as the country’s benchmark stock index hit a record in the period.】

item.title: 经济学家称印尼意外加息可能不是最后一次
item.description: 经济学家们认为，印尼央行无法控制的外部风险加剧，可能使其很难将 4 月份的加息称为一劳永逸。【原文：The heightened external risks that are beyond Bank Indonesia’s grip may make it tough to call its April’s rate hike as one-and-done, according to economists.】

item.title: 迫于总理压力，泰国银行下调部分借款人利率
item.description: 本周早些时候，泰国总理沙维信（Srettha Thavisin）发出呼吁，泰国最大的商业银行同意暂时降低弱势群体和小企业的借贷成本。【原文：Thailand’s biggest commercial banks agreed to temporarily lower borrowing costs for vulnerable groups and small businesses, following an appeal by Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin earlier this week.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国市场现在的动向
item.description: 2024年4月23日星期二，英国伦敦市，伦敦证券交易所集团公司办公中庭的一块板上显示股票价格信息。4 月 21 日（周一），富时 100 指数收盘价创下一年多来的新高，原因是近期股市波动和地缘政治风险促使投资者纷纷涌入英国基准指数中的防御性板块。摄影：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：Stock price information displayed on a board at the London Stock Exchange Group Plc in the company's office atrium in the City of London, UK, on Tuesday, April 23, 2024. The FTSE 100 Index closed at a record high, on Monday, April 21, for the first time in more than a year, as recent equity market volatility and geopolitical risks prompted investors to pile into the defensive sectors that characterize the UK benchmark. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: 保乐力加销售额持平，中国和美国困境依旧
item.description: 保乐力加公司（Pernod Ricard SA）称，由于美国和中国市场对其高价酒的需求持续疲软，该公司的季度销售额持平。【原文：Pernod Ricard SA said quarterly sales were flat as weak demand in the US and China markets for its pricey booze continued.】

item.title: 瑞士联合银行因瑞士法郎疲软而恢复季度盈利
item.description: 由于瑞士法郎疲软，瑞士国家银行恢复了季度盈利，这可能有助于官员们重建央行枯竭的资本基础。【原文：The Swiss National Bank returned to a quarterly profit because of the weakness of the franc, potentially helping officials to rebuild the central bank’s depleted capital base.】

item.title: 韩元走软，现代汽车利润超出预期
item.description: 现代汽车公司（Hyundai Motor Co.【原文：Hyundai Motor Co. reported first-quarter profit that beat analysts’ estimates as a weaker Korean won helped bolster its bottom line.】

item.title: 德意志银行旗下 DWS 报告资金流入；资产攀升至历史新高
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）的投资部门 DWS 集团（DWS Group）公布，由于投资者增加了被动型产品的配置，资金流入将管理资产推向了历史新高。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG’s investment arm DWS Group posted inflows that pushed assets under management to a record high, as investors increased their allocations in passive products.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行固定收益交易员连续第四个季度业绩下滑
item.description: 法国巴黎银行的固定收益交易员在第一季度的表现落后于华尔街所有大型银行，使投资银行其他部门的强劲表现黯然失色。【原文：BNP Paribas SA’s fixed-income traders trailed all of the large Wall Street banks in the first quarter, taking the shine off a strong performance in other parts of the investment bank.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】
